page.title: 13Sawston/Babraham School Day
page.content: The teacher blows a whistle and we line up in our classes ready to go in. Register is taken by the teacher. Morning lessons go on until 12 noon, with a break from 10.25-10.40 and include, Maths,(working from an illustrated text book, practical work and investigations); Reading,(library books, group readers, class readers); Language,(Working from illustrated text books, work sheets, dictionary and vocabulary work, discussions, debates,reports, story writing); Handwriting; Poetry.In the mornings we also have assemblies and hymn practice. Afternoon school begins at 1.15. We do things like Project; Art and Craft; Music; P.E.;Sewing. We use the radio or T.V sometimes, and go out of school to visit interesting places. School clubs include, Chess, Choir, Netball,Gym. School ends at 3.30pm.
